name: Margonem 2
storyline: Margonem is a heroic fantasy world where heroes struggle to survive in a rebuilding world after the Mages' War has nearly wiped out the land. Their spells summoned menacing, magical creatures that still inhabit the world. Heroes descend into the Dungeons to fight creatures, using customized deck of cards.
summary:
Explore Dungeons, get the Loot, craft your Deck!

Are you looking for adventure, treasure or both? Explore Dungeons, defeat Monsters, and find Treasure!

Craft powerful cards and gear to overcome the dangers of the Dungeons.

Margonem 2 is a free-to-play indie action card game. Mix of rogue-like dungeon crawler with a deckbuilder for mobile devices.
